message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $160. How about we meet at $140?
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I really need to make a profit on this one. How about we meet at $155? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least that much for it.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with $155. How about we meet at $145?
